dialog.text:
This is a beautifull place. I like 
it as well. Last summer Iâ€™ve been 
there several times. I Like the 
rest-place under this big tree on the 
half of the way.

answers.text:
Oh realy. What are your plans for 
today? Do you want to come with me?

I like the silence and Loneliness 
in the mountains. If possible i choose 
the smaler and not known ways,

Near to the rest place i discovered 
a Spring where some strange bubbles 
appear sometimes.
